description: Details required for Conditions 14 and 15 (Refuse & Cycle Parking) of planning permission 21/01585/FUL (Erection of new 3 storey building with basement containing 7no. self-contained residential units with ancillary cycle store and refuse/recycling store (following demolition of existing dwellinghouse)
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 14 (Refuse and Recycling Storage Facilities) of planning permission 21/01585/FUL the proposal fails to ensure satisfactory refuse facilities in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.Please note, Refuse and recycling should not be located to the front of the property, it should be located in a sensitive and discrete location.
